attributes.action: advise the public sector to migrate from  Internet Explorer 6 and consider Open Source alternatives.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Current DoH advice to NHS trusts is that they migrate from IE6.  However, the advice does not go far enough in that it recommends an upgrade to IE7.  This ignores past government advice that Open Source alternatives should also be considered.
